thread.title: Duo Security Makes Wealthfront's List of Top Career-Launching Tech Companies
thread.title_full: Duo Security Makes Wealthfront's List of Top Career-Launching Tech Companies

author: admin
title: Duo Security Makes Wealthfront's List of Top Career-Launching Tech Companies
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/12/2015 @ 6:00 AM   Duo Security 
ANN ARBOR, MI -- (Marketwired) -- 10/12/15 -- Duo Security , a cloud-based access security provider protecting the world's largest and fastest-growing companies, today announces its inclusion on Wealthfront's list of "Top Career-Launching Tech Companies," which recognizes companies that are ideal places for young people to start their careers. 
With a more than 200 percent increase in revenue in 2014 and tripling its employee headcount during 2015, Duo Security fits Wealthfront's criteria of eligible companies for their list. This year, Duo Security announced their C round of $30M, led by Redpoint Ventures and including participation by current investors Benchmark, Google Ventures, Radar Partners and True Ventures. Duo has also experienced significant customer growth, nearly doubling from around 7,000 customers to over 12,000, including large enterprises such as Facebook, Twitter, Zillow, The Men's Wearhouse, Etsy, Yelp, and NASA. Duo has offices in Ann Arbor, Michigan, Silicon Valley and London, and it quickly growing to become a global force in the security industry. 
"We're honored to be on Wealthfront's list alongside some of our customers such as Eventbrite and Zenefits, as well as partners such as Twilio and Wordpress," said Dug Song, CEO and co-founder of Duo Security. "At Duo, we're actively growing our team, but not just in number. Leaders create other leaders. We hire people that are not only outstanding unique contributors themselves, but who also want to build up their peers in a fast-paced environment." 
"I learn something new every day at Duo," said Lulu Tang, Product Designer at Duo Security and recent graduate of the University of Michigan. "On top of quickly building and accelerating my career here, my ability to collaborate between different departments in the company has really proven the value of the culture of creativity and generosity." 
If you're interested in joining the team at Duo Security, visit https://www.duosecurity.com/company/jobs . 
About Duo Security Duo Security is a cloud-based access security provider protecting the world's fastest-growing companies and thousands of organizations worldwide, including Zillow, Etsy, NASA, Facebook, Paramount Pictures, Random House, Toyota, Twitter, Yelp, TripAdvisor, The Men's Warehouse, Dresser-Rand Group, K-Swiss, SuddenLink, and more. Duo Security's innovative and easy-to-use technology can be quickly deployed to protect users, data, and applications from breaches, credential theft and account takeover. Duo Security is backed by Benchmark, Google Ventures, Radar Partners, Redpoint Ventures and True Ventures. Try it for free at www.duosecurity.com . Contact:
